Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.LeaderCard

Interface LeaderCardRequirements

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ColorRequired, LevelRequired, ResourcesRequired
public interface LeaderCardRequirements
extends java.io.Serializable
this interface represent the leader card requirements

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<BackColor> colors()
    USEFUL ONLY FOR CLIENTS this method returns the list of BackColor associated to the requirement
    boolean containsRequirements​(RealPlayer toVerify)
    this method verify if a player can activate a leader card
    java.lang.String identifier()
    USEFUL ONLY FOR CLIENTS this method returns the String that identifies the requirement
    java.lang.String toString()  

  • Method Details

    • containsRequirements

      boolean containsRequirements​(RealPlayer toVerify)
      this method verify if a player can activate a leader card
      Parameters:
      toVerify - this is the player that the method have to check if contains all the requirements
      Returns:
      true if the player contains all the requirements false otherwise
